description: Creates an entry (a rule) in a network ACL with the specified rule number.

researchLinks.description: AWS EC2 Network Access Control List Creation
Enhancing Your Security Visibility and DetectionResponse Operations in AWS

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateNetworkAclEntry to allow traffic to the network from an IP they control.

simulation.value: aws ec2 create-network-acl-entry --network-acl-id acl-5fb85d36 --ingress --rule-number 100 --protocol udp --port-range From=53,To=53 --cidr-block 0.0.0.0/0 --rule-action allow
